functions.name: GetChannel
functions.desc: This method gets the reference to a channel

functions.name: WaitForChannel
functions.desc: This method waits for the channel until the requested channel is ready to be listened to

params.name: channelId
params.desc: The ID of the channel you want to communicate thru

params.name: timeout
params.desc: How long until it gives up looking for the channel

functions.name: _AddChannel
functions.desc: Caches the channel after it was created in the server

functions.name: _RemoveChannel
functions.desc: Removes the channel after it was removed in the server

functions.name: _MessageFromServer
functions.desc: Used to listen to messages from the server

name: ChannelController
desc:
This contains a channel communication controller. This is used
by the ItemLifeCycle but it can be used for anything else
